Sentencas: A square grain model is proposed for the calculation of the area-specific resistance (ASR) of porous cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) by means of the finite element approach.
Titulo: Modeling of the Area-specific Resistance of SOFC Cathodes by Application of a Square Grain Model Involving Grain Boundaries

Sentencas: The grains and pores are represented by squares of equal side length.
Titulo: Modeling of the Area-specific Resistance of SOFC Cathodes by Application of a Square Grain Model Involving Grain Boundaries

Sentencas: The grain boundaries are assumed to be thin slabs of uniform thickness.
Titulo: Modeling of the Area-specific Resistance of SOFC Cathodes by Application of a Square Grain Model Involving Grain Boundaries

Sentencas: Both blocking conditions for the ionic current and fast transport of oxide ions along the grain boundaries have been taken into account.
Titulo: Modeling of the Area-specific Resistance of SOFC Cathodes by Application of a Square Grain Model Involving Grain Boundaries

Sentencas: The results of the simulation suggest that highly active cathode materials could be developed by increasing the grain boundary ionic conductivity.
Titulo: Modeling of the Area-specific Resistance of SOFC Cathodes by Application of a Square Grain Model Involving Grain Boundaries

Sentencas: In the case of an average grain size of 0.1?mu m, a remarkable decrease of the ASR is predicted, if the ionic conductivity of the grain boundaries exceeds that of the bulk by a factor of 100.
Titulo: Modeling of the Area-specific Resistance of SOFC Cathodes by Application of a Square Grain Model Involving Grain Boundaries

Sentencas: The model has been applied to simulate the increase of the ASR due to degradation of La0.6Sr0.4CoO3 delta in dry and humid atmospheres at 600?degrees C.
Titulo: Modeling of the Area-specific Resistance of SOFC Cathodes by Application of a Square Grain Model Involving Grain Boundaries

Sentencas: A rapid increase of the ASR is predicted in H2O-containing atmospheres.
Titulo: Modeling of the Area-specific Resistance of SOFC Cathodes by Application of a Square Grain Model Involving Grain Boundaries

Sentencas: The effect of Cr-poisoning on the ASR has been modeled for dry and humid atmospheres at 600?degrees C.
Titulo: Modeling of the Area-specific Resistance of SOFC Cathodes by Application of a Square Grain Model Involving Grain Boundaries

Sentencas: The degradation owing to Cr-poisoning is most pronounced in atmospheres containing water vapor.
Titulo: Modeling of the Area-specific Resistance of SOFC Cathodes by Application of a Square Grain Model Involving Grain Boundaries
